archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1107
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer that completes self diagnostics prior to calling technical support I am given the results of my own self troubleshooting that can be shared with the help agent, so that I can have an informed conversation with the agent

properties.value: Previously assumed that self-diagnostic would be a static instruction page. Is self-troubleshooting realized by an integration, or you want to build some capabilities in that regard in BSS? Maybe a questionnaire ending with a ticket registration?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
